content.title: Text to diagram
content.layoutDescription: Left text area, right diagram preview
content.visibleText:
Text to diagram

Mermaid

Currently only Flowchart, Sequence, and Class Diagrams are supported. The other types will be rendered as image in Boxdraw.

Mermaid Syntax

For our CI/PIF testing, to gather feedback or offer support
===> CI/PIF Team Chat
===> [Click Here](#) [We'd like to share Their Opinions]
===> [Click Here](#) [We'd like to Collect your thoughts and experiences regarding our offer?]

CI/PIF Team
===> [Click Here](#) [It's great! Your feedback is incredibly valuable to us!]
===> [Click Here](#) [Can you tell us about your experience with CI/PIF so far?]
===> [Click Here](#) [Do you have what specific features you find most beneficial?]
===> [Click Here](#) [Haven't used it much]
===> [Click Here](#) [Is there any specific that has prevented you from using it more extensively?]

CI/PIF Help
===> [Click Here](#) [I'd like to request an assist]
===> [Click Here](#) [Can I ask if there's a specific reason you're not interested in sharing feedback?]
===> [Click Here](#) [Would there be a better title for a CI/PIF-related initiative?]
===> [Click Here](#) [Can't find it useful]
===> [Click Here](#) [Is there something you found lacking or what improvements you'd like to see?]

windows.title: How to use Musho AI to generate UI | by Xinran Ma | Bootcamp - Google Chrome - Firat (trilogy.com)

uiElements.details: address bar, tabs, bookmarks bar, vertical scrollbar

content.title: Musho AI is a Figma plugin
content.layoutDescription: Text content in a structured format
content.visibleText:
Musho AI is a Figma plugin that you can get in any Figma file. It turns your prompts into nearly-complete, dev-ready websites with layouts, copy, and images.

Overall Impression
Pros:
- Integrated into Figma.
- Includes responsive designs as part of the generation.
- Offers royalty-free images as part of the generation.
- Features additional capabilities, such as generating social media posts.
- Created by Pablo Stanley.

Cons:
- Generation takes a relatively long time (around 1 minute).
- The “Remix” feature, designed to iterate the design of a section, has a lot of potential but doesn’t work as expected yet.

Here is a step-by-step walkthrough of how I created a landing page with Musho:

Step 1: Provide a design prompt
To facilitate a better comparison, I used the same prompt that I tested with the Framer AI tool. It was a comprehensive prompt, including detailed information about the company’s vision and website structure.

windows.title: GPT5 : Everything we know about it | by Yash Bhaskar | Medium

uiElements.details: Scroll bar visible on the right side

content.title: Article Content
content.visibleText:
Greg Brockman

The underlying spirit in many debates about the pace of AI progress—that we need to take safety very seriously and proceed with caution—is key to our mission. We spent more than 6 months testing GPT-4 and making it even safer, and with it on its way of alignment research that we pursued in anticipation of models like GPT-4.

We expect to continue to ramp up our safety precautions more proactively than many of our users would like. Our general sense is far from model GPT-3 ship to be not met aligned anymore, and it's been crucial for each model we (initially) deployed without any special alignment. GPT-3 (aligned enough to be deployed in ChatGPT), and now GPT-4 performs much better on all our safety mechanisms than GPT-3.

We believe and have been saying in policy discussions with (governments) that powerful training inputs should be reported to governments, the capability and increasingly sophisticated predictions of behavior accompanied by, and requisite best practices such as dangerous capability testing, weak governance of large-scale compute usage, safety standards, and the retention of lesson-sharing from deployment are good ideas, but the details really matter and should adapt over time as the technology evolves. It's also important to address the whole spectrum of risks from present-day issues to GPT, preventing misuse or self-harm, mitigating bias to longer-term existential ones.

Source: https://medium.com/@yashbhaskar/gpt5-everything-we-know-about-it-7c6c0c987b88
